001package gbw.melange.common.shading.constants;
002
003/**
004 * For caching purposes
005 */
006public enum ShaderClassification {
007    /**
008     * More computationally heavy than a texture sampler or Unknown.
009     * If static, this shader should be cached.
010     */
011    COMPLEX(1f),
012    /**
013     * Requires nothing but a bound texture and/or texCoords. It makes no sense to cache this, as the exchanged texture shader is as complex
014     */
015    PURE_SAMPLER(.5f),
016    /**
017     * Constant color requiring no bound resources or the like. It makes no sense to cache this, as the exchanged texture sampling shader is more complex
018     * texCoords is allowed.
019     */
020    SIMPLE(0f);
021
022    public final float abstractValRep;
023    ShaderClassification(float abstractValRep){
024        this.abstractValRep = abstractValRep;
025    }
026}
